overview: Aunt Peg, a sexy and sassy woman, returns in her hottest feature yet! There are those things that just get better all the time and luscious Aunt Peg is the best! She's the movie producer casting her latest X-rated classic, and every star in Hollywood will do anything to get in it! She may have to pick one of these lusty stars to be the lead in her movie. But in all the behind the scenes action it's Aunt Peg who's the hottest star of all!
tagline: America's Favorite Aunt Goes Hollywood... ALL THE WAY!!
title: Aunt Peg Goes Hollywood
